data.question: What is the formula of the dimeric compound synthesized from 8-Hqoac, Co(NO3)2, and NaN3 in CH3OH/H2O?
What transformation occurs to the dimeric compound [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] upon heating at 150 °C under vacuum?
True or False: The transformation from [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] to [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n is reversible.
What type of magnetic property change is observed in the transformation from [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] to [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n?
data.answer: From short-range ferromagnetic coupling to long-range spin-canting antiferromagnetic ordering.

data.question: What is the weight loss percentage observed in the thermogravimetric analysis of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] between 165 to 190 °C?
What is the role of the aqua ligands in the structure of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2]?
data.answer: The aqua ligands are hydrogen-bonded to an uncoordinated carboxy oxygen atom of an adjacent dimer, forming a hydrogen-bonded network.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic behavior of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n is field-independent.
What is the χMT value per dimer of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] at 300 K?
What happens to the χMT value of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n below 25 K?
data.answer: The χMT value rises abruptly to a sharp maximum at ca. 11 K, then drops rapidly to 2 K.

data.question: True or False: The transformation from [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] to [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n involves a change in symmetry and lattice parameters.
What is the role of the anti−anti carboxylate bridges in [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n?
data.answer: They connect each dimer to four neighboring ones, giving rise to a (4,4) layer.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic behavior of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] is consistent with other double EO azido-bridged dimers.
What is the J value for the intradimer interaction in [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2]?
True or False: The transformation from [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] to [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n is the first example of a SCSC transformation from 0D metal complexes to a 2D coordination polymer.
What is the critical temperature of the phase change observed in [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n?
True or False: The magnetization of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n at 7 T is consistent with a total alignment of spins.
What is the coercive field of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n at 2 K?
True or False: The presence of anti−anti carboxylate bridges in [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n significantly enhances the interdimer antiferromagnetic interaction.
What is the remnant magnetization of [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n at 2 K?
True or False: The transformation from [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2(H2O)2] to [Co2(8-qoac)2(N3)2]n does not involve any change in the coordination geometry of the CoII ions.
